theRose:TemperTantrum.NAME: Temper Tantrum
theRose:TemperTantrum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! Flipper Flap into your hand.

theRose:BeakDive.NAME: Beak Dive
theRose:BeakDive.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when in Flight. Deal !D! damage. Lose all flight.

theRose:Peck.NAME: Peck
theRose:Peck.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable. If in Flight, apply !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak.

theRose:UberDishes.NAME: UberDishes
theRose:UberDishes.DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Food items in your discard pile.
theRose:UberDishes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create !M! random Upgraded Food items in your discard pile.

theRose:FriedChicken.NAME: Fried Chicken
theRose:FriedChicken.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

theRose:Hamburger.NAME: Hamburger
theRose:Hamburger.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This cards counts as 3 Food items. Exhaust.

theRose:HungryForm.NAME: Hungry Form
theRose:HungryForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, consume !M! random Food item.
theRose:HungryForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, consume !M! random Food items.

theRose:Reorder.NAME: Reorder
theRose:Reorder.DESCRIPTION: Return all Exhausted Food items to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theRose:BellyBump.NAME: Belly Bump
theRose:BellyBump.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Food items eaten this combat. Set the counter to a quarter.
theRose:BellyBump.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of Food items eaten this combat. Set the counter to a half.

theRose:SharingIsCaring.NAME: Sharing Is Caring
theRose:SharingIsCaring.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity for the number of Food items in your hand. Exhaust all Food items.

theRose:ChefRose.NAME: Chef Rose
theRose:ChefRose.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add a random Food item to your hand.
theRose:ChefRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add a random Upgraded Food item to your hand.

theRose:TakesiesBacksies.NAME: Takesies Backsies
theRose:TakesiesBacksies.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! Passivity, reduce Passivity by !M!, deal !D! damage, and consume a random Food item.

theRose:StayStill.NAME: Stay Still!
theRose:StayStill.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if no Attack was played. Apply !M! Passivity. End your turn.

theRose:PenguinBackRide.NAME: Penguin Back Ride
theRose:PenguinBackRide.DESCRIPTION: Apply Passivity equal to !M! times your Flight. Lose all Flight.

theRose:Smile.NAME: Smile!
theRose:Smile.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Passivity and !theRose:SecondMagic! Weak to all enemies.

theRose:Betray.NAME: Betray
theRose:Betray.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 2 times an enemy's Passivity. Reduce Passivity to 0.

theRose:NappyTime.NAME: Nappy Time!
theRose:NappyTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Plated Armor. End your turn.

theRose:Chub.NAME: Chub
theRose:Chub.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Food item eaten this combat. Set the counter to a quarter.
theRose:Chub.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Food item eaten this combat. Set the counter to a half.

theRose:PermanentChub.NAME: Permanent Chub
theRose:PermanentChub.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for every Food item eaten this game. Reset this counter. Exhaust.

theRose:BellySlide.NAME: Belly Slide
theRose:BellySlide.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played out of Flight. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Draw 1 card.

theRose:LucidDream.NAME: Lucid Dream
theRose:LucidDream.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played out of Flight. Create 1 random Food item. Gain 1 Flight. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Flight.

theRose:MidflightSnack.NAME: Midflight Snack
theRose:MidflightSnack.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Draw 1 card. Create 1 random Food item in your hand. Lose 1 Flight.

theRose:Boost.NAME: Boost
theRose:Boost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Draw 3 cards.

theRose:Roost.NAME: Roost
theRose:Roost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Gain !B! Block. End your turn.

theRose:GustOfWind.NAME: Gust Of Wind
theRose:GustOfWind.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played in Flight. Deal !D! damage for every 1 Flight.

theRose:ShortHop.NAME: Short Hop
theRose:ShortHop.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played out of Flight. Gain 1 Flight. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Flight.

theRose:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRose:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRose:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRose:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRose:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRose:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRose:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRose:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRose:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theRose:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
